pages.title: Welcome to Pigment!
pages.text: Pigment is a full-feature mod about magic and exploration.

Pigment is based on color mixing of the subtractive color system (CMYK). Subtractive color mixing may be familiar to you from painting with watercolors or printing.$(br2)Pigments main colors are represented by gemstones, found in geodes scattered around the world, with the vanilla Amethyst representing the Magenta part of the spectrum.

Pigment comes with a builtin progression system based on advancements.$(br)As you delve deeper into Pigment you will notice changes in the world. Differences, that only you can perceive.$(br2)Everything you learn will bring you closer to your final destination: Finding out what is waiting for you beneath the up until then impenetrable bedrock floor.
Pigment is still in heavy development. If you find a bug or have a suggestion visit me on github!
